OOC: Lol! Robo, you sure time your laying down with Nightlight thing!

BIC:

Katya: No, not right away. I propose we plan something out and then go
and present it to him. We will need maps, unit rosters,
intelligence... the whole thing. Do you agree?

Blackfang: Well... At least there's a reason you're a commander. You
sure seem able to plan an assault!
